citations.narrative:
There is a large build up of feces in the bison enclosure adjacent to the hay feeder. This area needs to have
accumulations of feces removed more frequently to reduce this build for the health of the animals.
Correct by: June 30, 2024

citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
The facility does not have an written environmental enhancement plan in place to promote the overall psychological well-
being of the birds at the facility. Exhibitors must develop, document and follow a species appropriate plan for the
environmental enhancement to promote the psychological well-being of the birds that is within industry standards and
approved by the attending veterinarian. This plan must be made available for future inspections.
Correct by: July 1, 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.131(a) 
   
Sanitation. 
There is a large build up of feces in the bison enclosure adjacent to the hay feeder. This area needs to have 
accumulations of feces removed more frequently to reduce this build for the health of the animals.  
Correct by: June 30, 2024 
3.154 
   
Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being. 
The facility does not have an written environmental enhancement plan in place to promote the overall psychological well-
being of the birds at the facility. Exhibitors must develop, document and follow a species appropriate plan for the 
environmental enhancement to promote the psychological well-being of the birds that is within industry standards and 
approved by the attending veterinarian. This plan must be made available for future inspections.  
Correct by: July 1, 2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
